Show 176

March 23, 2001

The first of the year's two funding drive shows - lots of uptempo party funk and heavy hip-hop, and the WeFunk crew begging for pledges to fund the station.

Want to help out too? Please make a donation to support CKUT radio, WEFUNK's parent station.

DJs & GUESTS DJ Static, Professor Groove, Evan, Terna / PLAYLIST MARKING jcw1963 / HOSTING Jens Meiert, Florian, Oliver, Mike, CyberWurx hosting, Travis, Dan, daduke, Tim, PJ, Tom, DK, punq.org, Marshall, Augustinas, Stef, Silvio, Mads, Chris, Alan & Greg. You can help too!


  • intro
  • house guests - what so never the dance
  • talk (over average white band - pick up the pieces)
  • talib kweli - move somethin'
  • pharoahe monch - simon says (blend with pharoahe monch - behind closed doors instrumental)
  • pete rock feat. kurupt, inspektah deck - true master
  • jeru the damaja - come clean
  • grover washington jr. - knucklehead
  • j.b.'s - same beat
  • j.b.'s - you can have watergate but gimme some bucks and i'll be straight
  • o'jays - for the love of money
  • jurassic 5 - unified rebelution (blend with godfather don - big kats instrumental)
  • blackalicious - swan lake
  • k.m.d. - constipated monkey
  • public enemy - timebomb
  • talk (over meters - just kissed my baby, blackbyrds - do it fluid)
  • j.b.'s - (it's not the express) it's j.b.'s monorail
  • meters - funky miracle
  • j.b.'s - givin' up food for funk
  • gang starr - here today gone tomorrow
  • billy cobham - crosswind
  • common sense - i used to love h.e.r. (remix)
  • talk (over common sense - i used to love h.e.r. instrumental)
  • buckshot lefonque - breakfast @ dennys
  • talk (over diamond d, sadat x & lord finesse - u can't front instrumental)

This playlist is courtesy of the WEFUNK Playlist Project. Thanks to Johnathan James and Gerardo Samudio for their work in putting this playlist together.
